title: bitzizzix
author: bitzizzix
content: Bitcoin will soon reach $110,000 and currently the price of Bitcoin has reached 107,500 and this makes 2 of my friends very happy.I have two close friends who used to be my music friends or band friends, and now we rarely meet because they are busy working as Pilots and the other one because he works out of town. And we met on November 18th at a place we often visited at that time, and we chatted a lot while asking about our activities and I told them that I was involved or invested in Bitcoin, they knew about crypto especially Bitcoin but didn't know the details and its functions.And they seemed curious to know more and finally I gave a basic explanation along with the benefits that I had gotten and also the real results that I had gotten finally my two friends were interested and I immediately and at that time also made a wallet and so on for my two friends who are still communicating until now, moreover my two friends are smart and immediately understand and can also operate it finally they bought Bitcoin on the night of November 18th and I don't know how much they bought if I'm not mistaken around $90,000+.And earlier my two friends contacted me when the price of Bitcoin reached $107,500 and they were very happy and I was happy to see my two old friends happy because they had made a profit of 18% to 19% from the price they bought on that date and I forgot how much it was at that time.And I continue to motivate them to continue holding or if they want to continue buying periodically because I guarantee that in 2024 the price of Bitcoin will reach $150,000-$180,000.And I want to know your response, because I also don't want to interfere in their affairs after getting involved with Bitcoin even though it's because of me. But I'm sure they also have intelligence, understanding and also have the ability to grow in this industry and we also always communicate even though I sometimes ignore and divert the conversation because I don't want to feel dizzy.

But I'm sure they also have intelligence, understanding and also have the ability to grow in this industry and we also always communicate even though I sometimes ignore and divert the conversation because I don't want to feel dizzy.It's great to see you and your friends happy! However, I’d suggest avoiding specific dates when predicting a Bitcoin target price. Bitcoin has a way of surprising and shocking everyone. Instead, you could say, "Bitcoin will definitely reach $150k if you HODL," but avoid attaching a timeframe. There’s no guarantee, and no analyst can promise certainty. It’s also possible that BTC could drop below $100k by the end of the year. If that happens, your friends—especially if they’ve invested at $90k and are still new to Bitcoin’s movements—might feel disappointed or upset. Good luck, and let’s enjoy the ride!

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: It's good that your friends made some profit from Bitcoin and shared this good news with you. But what if it was the other way around? It wouldn't be nice if the price of Bitcoin started to fall and they blamed you. That's why I don't give advice like that to anyone. It's good that the price is going up and your/their investments are appreciating because we're in a bull market, but in a crash or a bear market, people will look for someone to blame. I have told many of my friends what Bitcoin is for years. But I never gave buying advice and I never said that the price of Bitcoin will be this much. These are all assumptions, there is no certainty. I believed that Bitcoin would be $1 million one day, even when Bitcoin was in the triple digits, we've already seen 100k. But I would never tell anyone to invest in Bitcoin because the price will multiply 10 times. It's useless to take responsibility for that and it doesn't do me any good. Everyone should make their own investment decisions.

comments.author: Botnake
comments.body: This cycle is the most stable bull run I’ve seen. It’s slow but very consistent. Of course, we’ve had some minor dumps, but that’s just part of it... it doesn’t look like a pump-and-dump scheme like in the earlier stages. I’d say the market has matured, and holding now feels much more secure, especially if you tend to panic when you see dips.I believe $110k will happen soon, and $150k might even be possible this year. However, the bull market shouldn’t end this year, as historically, it usually continues into the early months of the following year. For this cycle, I’d love to see that trend break and the bull market continue for the entire year.Same day last year,  Bitcoin’s price was only $41,392.63. That means we’re already up 154% in just one year. Imagine how much more growth we could see in the coming years.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: This is where understanding Bitcoin's fundamentals comes in and whether you're convinced of it or not. I don't know how much your friends understand Bitcoin or whether they're interested in it only as an investment, but if they believe in what Bitcoin truly offers, they would keep it regardless of the 19% return after only a month and the prospect of $180,000 next year. comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on December 16, 2024, 09:06:27 PMI wonder how happy your friends gonna be if bitcoin drops down to let's say $60k, which is always a possibility.   Anyway, I sure hope you explain to them that in the end there's still some risk involved and there is always a chance (despite how small it is) that they will end up with nothing. It's kind of funny that a large number of people don't think of that scenario when investing in Bitcoin. Everything is possible, and to be honest, it's highly probable we'll be in another bear market after the year 2025. As others have already suggested, the OP shouldn't make promises that can't be kept; it's not on you to promise them it'll surpass $150,000. You mentioned 2024, but I'm assuming you meant 2025. Maybe it will, but maybe it won't; the price goes both ways. You've prompted them into buying Bitcoin, but that doesn't necessarily mean that they have full knowledge of how to manage their investment. Being overly confident is as bad as being overly pessimistic.
